programme.title: Breeze
programme.desc: The nearly 70-year old Yu Zhao's has lived an ordinary life in the city and one day decides to set off on a journey to find the place where his body and soul truly belong.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Ellen Eliasoph, a trailblazing Hollywood independent producer and long-time catalyst for China–U.S. film collaboration, unpacks the success of Nezha and explores China’s growing storytelling influence in global film markets.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Pan Han is interrograted by the police as the main suspect in Shen Yu Fei's homicide, but soon, the security cameras, ballistic and blood splatter analysis lead to the conclusion that Shen Yu Fei committed suicide and Pan Han is released.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie hears the news about Shen Yu Fei and goes to pay her respects at the temple. Wang Miao and Shi Qiang speculate there are divisions within the ETO. Wang Miao jumps back into the game while the search for the server's location continues.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Xie Ying is pregnant and looks for Gui Qiang to discuss the matter, both feeling helpless. As the spokesperson for a cosmetics brand, Gui Qiang's manager wants him to keep a low profile, leaving him troubled. Xie Ying intends to give birth to the child but Gui Qiang does not know how to explain his feelings. Xie Ying leaves after she feels that Gui Qiang does not want the child.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: After a few setbacks, Xie Ying and Gui Qiang decide to have the child. Mandy worries that Xie Ying will not be able to adapt to becoming a mother as she is still young. Mandy cannot help but confide in Dong Yu who comforts her and gives her flu medicine, asking her to take care of herself before trying to take care of her family. Jia Qi is unhappy to see Dong Yu caring for Mandy.

programme.title: Breeze
programme.desc: The nearly 70-year old Yu Zhao's has lived an ordinary life in the city and one day decides to set off on a journey to find the place where his body and soul truly belong.

programme.title: Explore China
programme.desc: Learn about China's history and traditional culture, famous local delicacies and the influence of technology on daily life as Hal visits he Forbidden City, Sanlitun, Nanluoguxiang, Wangfujing, The Great Wall and Wutongyuan in Beijing.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: The Queen tries to win over Wen Zong Shen, but is rejected and angrily scolds him.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Xu presents the results of his investigation to Wang Lin, pointing out that Wen Zhong Shen and Xie Yuan are in collusion.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Zi Lu's men fail to catch the spy that was following him making him restless and fearful that Wang Lin will capture him.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: Zi Dan and Wang Xuan are imprisoned together by Zi Lu.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: The Emperor hints through a chess game that the situation could still turn around and tells Wang Xuan of a secret underground escape route.

programme.title: Better Plan for Better Life
programme.desc: The advancement of medical technology improves the quality of life and health through innovative diagnoses and treatments.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Although the abduction incident has again set a new ratings record, Ying-fei still does not ask Wai-sum to stay.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Lau Yim goes to the fire scene alone to take first-hand pictures.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Although the industrial building inferno is extinguished, public debate is getting more and more feverish.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Ka-yin’s suspicion is aroused as sees the king of jewelers outside the fire damaged industrial building, so she teams up with Lau Yim to investigate.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Lau Yim’s hair changes from long to short in the duration of a commercial break.

programme.title: Vanishing Days
programme.desc: In the muggy summer of 2009, reality and memory are tangled together, and water from the canal soaked everyone in those vanishing days.

programme.desc: Three foreign friends share their stories about China capturing the heartwarming, stirring and memorable moments they experienced, as well as the significant lessons for future generations.
